name: World's War
description:
This game was made in about two weeks for 32bit 2022 Game Jam.

This is my first time making a game in 3D (3rd game overall) so there may be some issues here or there. Anyway, if you play it I hope you enjoy it and have fun.

Controls:

WASD - Move

Mouse - Look

Walk over items to collect them (magazines, health packs).

Music: A Dark and Desperate Intro

Known bugs:

The enemies will sometimes not look at you when they're shooting and their gun may not move.
